title: december 5: great will hunting
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia goes into the secret history of a film we all know and love: Good Will Hunting. It premiered in theaters today in 1997. She also mourns the untimely death of a classical composer. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
